rev.desc.rev.desc: AGMRQ10H53160
Support 9.63 upgrade utility
Log export inf in upgrade.log
Optimize the query for exporting inf files
Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Store the counts of upgrade.info and data files for languages to make them accurate during upgrade.
AGMRQ10H43093 Smart Upgrade Utility I: Make smart upgrade utility for both classic and lightweight upgrade - part 1
Update the path to export and log
Only export upgraded data into custom upgrade package for lightweight upgrade from SM9.5x
Use apm.upgrade.dump.file but not apm.upgrade.write.file to dump data files.
Update information in UI when execute pre-upgrade task
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Support htmltemplates multi-language
Adjust the sql for info to query htmltemplates
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Remove non-PD data from Upgrade Utility
When dbdict exists in pdpatches, use true query to export data.
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Remove non-PD data from Upgrade Utility
Rollback: Create data folder when CM build
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Remove non-PD data from Upgrade Utility
Create data folder when CM build
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Support htmltemplates multi-language
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Support htmltemplates multi-language
Support L10N of unitofmeasure records in SM940 upgrade
The number of upgrade.mak always shows 70 when applying upgrade
The number of upgrade.mak always shows 70 when applying upgrade
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
For pd build, when the dbdict in patches is also in smpatches, set the query to true to export all records of the dbdict
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
Use the functions of ScriptLibrary upgradeFileHelper to get data folder and upgrade inf name
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
Optimized upgrade log during creating custom package.
Modified panel : setup.write.
Modified panel=prep.unload.inf to filter some format records with non-English
seperate upgrade.inf, format.dta, scmessage.dta and help.dta into several files based on languages
"$L.log" variable update, update from string to variable
remove upgrade typ
Changing the exit in decide.write to prep.write.file (DE4457)
TA3873 Break up the upgrade.dta file into separate files to make checkpointing the data load process possible.
DE1941 Removing calls to apm.upgrade.write.file where the parameters are built on the parameter line.
Deleted panel write.datadict panel and re-entered it using the SC5.1 client because the SC6.1 client is somehow not picking the panel up correctly.
Modified so datadicts are exported to upgrade.str with the same query as dbdicts.
Converted to use scmsg().
